review: Loved it !! A mature love story which is charming at the same time baring the harsh realities couples face. Give it a watch , and you will know what you have been missing all this time, watching garbage like Singh is King and Dabbangg. Must say, one of the most underrated movies.  .. and yes, the music is simple awesome.
